original_title: Ведмедик і той, що живе в річці
overview: A small funny brown bear paced joyfully in the woods. More recently, he did not leave his mother at all and now he came to the lakeon his own. Butwhat he saw there amazed him. Now he has to deal with his own reflection in the water, which can be both bad and friendly.
title: The Bear And The One Who Lives In The River
